#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define x first
#define y second
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define sz(a) (int)(a.size())
#define all(a) a.begin(), a.end()
#define R(a) ((a)%mod)

typedef vector<int> VI;
typedef vector<VI> VVI;
typedef long long ll;
typedef vector<ll> VL;
typedef vector<VL> VVL;
typedef vector<bool> VB;
typedef vector<string> VS;
typedef pair<ll, ll> PI;

int main(int argc, char const *argv[]) {
    // ios::sync_with_stdio(false);

    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    for (int cs = 0; cs < t; ++cs) {
        int n, m;
        scanf("%d %d", &n, &m);
        VI a(n);
        for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
            double x;
            scanf("%lf", &x);
            a[i] = 100.0 * x + 0.1;
        }
        sort(all(a));
        reverse(all(a));
        printf("Case %d:\n", cs + 1);
        for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
            double x;
            int amt;
            scanf("%lf", &x);
            amt = x * 100.0 + 0.1;
            printf("Scenario %d:\n", i + 1);

            for (int j = 0; j < n; ++j) if (amt >= a[j]) {
                if (a[j] < 100) {
                    printf("%.02lf %d\n", a[j] / 100.0, amt / a[j]);
                } else {
                    printf("%d %d\n", a[j] / 100, amt / a[j]);
                }
                amt %= a[j];
            }
        }
    }
    
    return 0;
}
